name: Game Idea Tool
description:
I created this project just to challenge myself to come up with a game idea every minute for as long as possible. It can be a little stressful to protect the buildings, but if the ideas keep flowing, you'll be fine.

Keep in mind that you're not trying to come up with the greatest ideas of all time. The idea is that if you can come up with even ten random things, maybe a few of them will have potential. Or maybe all. However it works out, just have fun, open up to new ideas and opportunities, and let me know what you come up with.

Here's the video on me using the tool if you want to check it out.
